mapper.select:
select
from t_dev_consume dc where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != '0' order by create_time DESC LIMIT 10

from t_dev_consume dc where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != '0' order by create_time DESC LIMIT 20
